result.execSummary:
All charges against Tavareus D Shorter in this case have been dismissed. These charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Tavareus D Shorter is presumed innocent.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Milwaukee County Clerk of Circuit Court

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Tavareus D Shorter

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Notice of bond forfeiture mailed to defendant; Original in file. ($250.00 signature bond) gj

Defendant Tavareus D Shorter in court with Attorney Gabriela A Leija.  Porchia Sharese Lewand appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
State informs Court that the victim informed the State they would not be appearing in court.  State requests adjournment of today's scheduled trial.
Defense counsel motion to dismiss.
Court orders case dismissed without prejudice.  Today's trial is vacated.
Clerk:  jms
Request for payment of $17  witness fees for witness Andrea H. processed and forwarded to the Treasurer's Office on check request x26212006 in court 1x on 8/5/15.
Request for payment of$17 witness fees for witness Shaunice M.  processed and forwarded to the Treasurer's Office on check request x26212005 in court 1x on 8/5/15.
Witness fee request prepared for Shaunice M. &  Andrea, H. will be forwarded to DAs Victim/Witness Services for approval and date confirmation.

Defendant Tavareus D Shorter in court with attorney Gabriela A Leija.  Elizabeth Longo appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  The state is prepared to proceed; citizen witness and Police officer present.  The defense is requesting an adjournment as new information has been received from the defendant.  The court will set a new trial date of 11-16-2015.  The court will no longer accept any plea bargains or negotiations.  If case is to resolve short of trial it must be brought in to the court at least ONE WEEK PRIOR to the scheduled date.  Jury trial scheduled for November 16, 2015 at 08:16 am.

Defendant Tavareus D Shorter in court with attorney Gabriela A Leija.  Nicolas J. Heitman appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Pretrial conference conducted.   Stipulation for a new court date signed and filed.  Jury Trial requested.  Jury trial scheduled for August 5, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Tavareus D Shorter in court with attorney Gabriela A. Leija.  Kristin M. Schrank appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Discovery and offer received by defense counsel.  Case adjourned for Pretrial Conference in Branch 4 on 4-24-2015 at 8:30 am.  All conditions of bail are continued, including the no contact order with Shaunice M., no violations of the law and no possession of weapons, until further order of the Court.   mld
Court ordered Justice Point Pretrial Services "Court Reminders."
Defendant advised No Contact Order remains in full force and effect.  Defendant to have no contact with: Shaunice M.

Defendant Tavareus D Shorter in court with attorney Gabriela A. Leija.  
Defendant Tavareus D Shorter in custody.  
Carole Manchester appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Flanagan, Branch 04.  
Scheduling conference scheduled for March 30, 2015 at 08:30 am.
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE BENCH  WARRANT.

Defendant Tavareus D Shorter not in court.  Kristin M. Schrank appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Case called at 10:33 am.  Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a Bench Warrant to issue.  mld

Defendant Tavareus D Shorter in court.  Evan Glaberson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
 Defendant is in the process of hiring Attorney Thomas Hackbart.  Case adjourned for Status of Counsel in Branch 4 on 3-5-2015 at 8:30 am.  All conditions of bail are continued, including the no contact order with Shaunice M., and no violations of the law, until further order of the Court.   mld
No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  
Defendant to have no contact with: SHAUNICE M. 
Court advised defendant that failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

Defendant Tavareus D Shorter in court with attorney Thomas K. Hackbart.  
Defendant Tavareus D Shorter in custody.  
William T. Berens appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  

Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Flanagan, Branch 04.  
Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  
Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  
IF RELEASED DEFENDANT IS  NOT INDIGENT AND DOES NOT QUALIFY FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Scheduling conference scheduled for February 10, 2015 at 08:30 am.
